lead_paragraph: As investigators comb through Omar Mateen’s past to glean an understanding of the young man whose attack on an Orlando nightclub left 49 dead and 53 wounded, a portrait of a complicated childhood and young adulthood is emerging. These documents offer a glimpse into Mr. Mateen’s life.

headline.main: A Glimpse of Omar Mateen's Past, From School Reports to Job Dismissal

snippet: As investigators comb through Omar Mateen’s past to glean an understanding of the young man whose attack on an Orlando nightclub left 49 dead and 53 wounded, a portrait of a complicated childhood and young adulthood is emerging. These documents offer a glimpse into Mr. Mateen’s life.
